solution_line_template: The burger meal is ${burger_meal_cost} and to upsize the meal is ${upsize_cost} so {burger_meal_cost}+{upsize_cost} = $<<{burger_meal_cost}+{upsize_cost}={daily_meal_cost}>>{daily_meal_cost}
He spends ${daily_meal_cost} on lunch and after {number_of_days} days he spends {daily_meal_cost}*{number_of_days} = $<<{daily_meal_cost}*{number_of_days}={total_spent}>>{total_spent}
